title: [Large-scale] Development of Multidisciplinary Patient Queue Management Training Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Understanding of Healthcare Systems and Teamwork Experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-based intensive short-term training to enhance multidisciplinary collaboration competencies among professionals in diverse fields (medical, legal, technical)

learning_goals: Learners can analyze patient queue management scenarios with 80% accuracy by applying collaboration protocols among various professional groups.
Learners can propose three or more strategies to resolve queue management inequalities using educational video and storyboard content.
Learners can achieve a completion rate of 90% or higher in self-directed learning outcomes through mobile platform evaluation tools.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
